Description: Epiphone S310L-B Left-Handed Electric Guitar Korea Professionally Set Up! You are viewing an Epiphone S310L-B left-handed electric guitar in a black gloss finish, made in Korea. It features a maple neck, maple fretboard, single coil pickups, tremolo bridge, and chrome hardware. It has some light scuffing/scratching and some stickers on the back, but is in good overall condition. It has been professionally set up in our shop to play great! The instrument pictured is the one you will receive. We use our own photos to ensure that you have a full view of the exact instrument you are purchasing. A case or a bag is available for an additional fee. Please contact us if you’re interested. PERRY'S PROFESSIONAL SETUP:This guitar has been professionally setup to play great!Guitars do not generally come from the factory setup, so this is a huge benefit for all players from beginning to professional, and in our opinion a must have! No professional player would use a guitar that hasn't been setup, nor should you!We normally charge $75 for this service, but for you this is a FREE BONUS included with every guitar we sell online!This includes truss rod adjustment, fret dressing, nut and saddle adjustment, and much more.**CLICK HERE FOR VIDEO** Click to edit text Listing and template services provided by inkFrog
